bug.short_desc: Eclipse compiler doesn't like method references with overloaded varargs method

long_desc.thetext: Srikanth, is this related to bug 439515?

(In reply to Stephan Herrmann from comment #1) > Srikanth, is this related to bug 439515?
Yes, I released a disabled regression test here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=aec729ad3adcaa5e52d24a53651dd8b9e99d3639.
I'll fix bug 439515 shortly.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 439515 ***
Verified for 4.5 M2 using build I20140915-2000
Verified for 4.5 M2 using build I20140915-2000
